sense.gloss: to invest in, to sink money into, to put into, to lay out (funds), to inject, to impregnate, to infuse, to instill, to implant, to imbue, to focus (attention, efforts)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑夢物語↑↓ゆめものがたり↓にお↑金↑↓かね↓を|つぎ↑込↑↓こ↓む|↑気↑↓き↓なんてないよ。
sdata.e: I have no interest in putting my money into your dreams.

sdata.j: ↑機械↑↓きかい↓によって↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑生↑↓い↓かしておくために、↑家族↑↓かぞく↓がすべてのお↑金↑↓かね↓を|つぎ↑込↑↓こ↓む|べきではありません。
sdata.e: A family should not spend all of its money to keep someone alive on a machine.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑競馬↑↓けいば↓に↑有↑↓あ↓り↑金↑↓がね↓↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓を|つぎ↑込↑↓こ↓む|ほど↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓ではない。
sdata.e: He knows better than to spend all his money on horse racing.
